text: William Andrew Edmondson (born October 12, 1946) is an American lawyer and politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Edmondson was the 16th Attorney General of Oklahoma from 1995 to 2011. In 2010, Edmondson ran and lost for Governor of Oklahoma. He was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Oklahoma in the 2018 gubernatorial election, but lost to Kevin Stitt. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Oklahoma Category:Politicians from Oklahoma Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Washington, D.C.
title: Drew Edmondson
